tool_description: Creates optimized app store screenshots with overlay text, device frames, and platform-specific formatting requirements.

device_type.description: Device type for screenshots: phone, tablet, or both

screenshot_urls.description: URLs or paths to raw screenshot images

brand_color.description: Primary brand color in hex format

error_messages: Invalid platform: Platform must be 'ios' or 'android'.
Invalid device type: Device type must be 'phone', 'tablet', or 'both'.
Screenshot format error: Screenshots must be in supported image formats (PNG, JPG).
Dimension mismatch: Screenshot dimensions don't match platform requirements.
Color format error: Brand color must be in valid hex format (#RRGGBB).
usage: Provide platform, device_type, and screenshot_urls. Optionally add overlay_texts and brand_color for customization. Returns formatted screenshots meeting store requirements.
